title: Operator Input Log
description: Schema for operator input entries, version 1.0.

loop_id.description: The identifier of the loop for which the input is provided.

decision_point.description: Specific point or reason in the loop requiring operator input.

operator_response_type.description: The type of response provided by the operator.

rationale.description: The operator's rationale for their decision.

confidence_score.description: The operator's confidence in their response (0-1 scale).

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the operator input was recorded.
